replies.body:
The Poro King is leaving us a sign, don't you see?
"Snowdown has ended,

But it lives on in yo[u],

Take ca[r]e and good [f]ortune,

‘Til we meet again [soon]."

The Poro King is trying to tell is that URF is coming back soon.

i think it leaves us a sign:

"Snowdown has ENDed, but it lives oN in yoU
take care and gooD fortunE
til we meet again Soon."
The Poro King is trying to tell u something ;)
Keep this at 69 upvotes.
Ahhh look at the league community coming together to make sure something stays the way it is. i mean this post can have 69 upvotes but graves can't ha-
I tried so hard. It was 70, so I downvoted, and it went to 68. {{item:3070}} {{item:3348}}

No, the Poro King is trying to say that you might be 

[S]nowdown has ended,
Bu[t] it lives [o]n i[n] you,
Take car[e] and goo[d] fortune,
‘Til we meet again soon.

we need this to have 420 upvotes
lets see if we can get it there LEAGUE COMMUNITY PULL TOGETHER FOR THIS
Looged in to upvote this {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

logged in just to upvote

jk i was already logged in
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} lol

{{summoner:30}} Be well my subjects until I return. 

{{summoner:31}} Where are you going King? 

{{summoner:30}} After all those snacks I was..."forced" to eat I am going to be busy for a few weeks at best. 

{{summoner:31}} .......oh


{{summoner:30}} Stay away from our secret Kingdom.
Someone need the royal bathroom?
ok
{{champion:33}} ok
{{champion:33}} Alright.
Okay
{{champion:33}} O K.
Finally, Summoners Rift won't hurt my eyes.
Finally, I can see Veigar's Event Horizon.
{{champion:45}} The tables were turned, and I showed you no MERCY!!!

I wish RIOT would consider adding Summoner Rift seasons. Like during spring make it cherry blossomish, summer make it as dingy as SR is, Fall give the trees some yellow and red, and for winter give it some snow. It sucks the snow has to go from SR. Looked great in my opinion. Or hell, do what Dota does map wise. Come out with a tier where you can purchase themes for YOUR map. I mean sure only you can see it, but still.
That's a good idea 8)

So I also really, really like the winter SR. That being said, there are a ton of people who hate it and say that it's hard to see particle effects on. I think it'd be cool if there was an option to toggle the map skins on or off.
Don't worry, We'll see it a million times in the rotating game que.
I loved Snowdown! The graphics were so beautiful, and the tiny candles burned so brightly! Loved finding the little sleds, presents, and Poro snowmen! Awesome job, Riot Graphics!
We will see you again Poro king in about 3 weeks!
Can't wait to play Ascension before Poro King comes back Kappa

{{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:102}} : WE'RE ALL SO FUCKING COLD. IM SO GLAD WINTER IS OVER.
{{champion:106}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:48}} :I LOVE THE FUCKING COLD IT'S SO GOOD.I HATE U GUYS. U GUYS ARE STUPID. FELESB@DMane
Us Canadians feel the same, the Rift was like home.

Does that mean we'll be able to play one of the other "rotating" game modes now? 
I like poro king, but the point of rotating them is so they stay fresh and interesting.
NOOOOO, SANTA BARON CAN'T LEAVE!!!
poor king all those Spicy Snax are gonna hurt coming back out.
So.... urf?
Can we Have an Urf event now? :3
Too bad Snowdown is going but its nice that the king leaves us URF soon.Well Now that its going My emotions wont change as much when i play Ranked,Its sad theres no snow there.
I suspect if we could skin battlegrounds that it would make Riot some decent coin.
I am gonna miss the snow covered rift and cute music playing T.T

this is so clickbait
i thought it was some end of year reward
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Tis a shame to see the wintery rift leave, but one question still remains for me. where are the scuttle crab icons?
they've got until January 23rd to show up

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016   this site says "UNLOCK ICONS & EMOTES
Use your sweets to unlock exclusive Snowdown icons and emotes. Emotes and Snowdown Sweets will expire on January 16, 2017 at 23:59 PT"     WTF RIOT BRING BACK THE EMOTES TILL 16th...
Really wish you kept this going longer. It was impossible for people who didn't buy chests to get some of the icons. Wish we knew that up front so we didn't start collecting for nothing.
Guess we'll have to wait another351 days{{item:3070}}
You mean at midnight right? I have some legacy skins to buy still. {{summoner:6}} Gotta hurry man
R.I.P

and still we feel the chill... 
until we see each other again {*waves goodbye for now to the snowbound rift*}
it was a great time. see ya again Snowdown.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
